Showcase

Source: vignettes/articles/gallery.qmd

Showcase of bundled themes in rstudiothemes.

You can installed them with:

rstudiothemes::install_rstudiothemes()

We also distribute all our themes in a single .zip file dist/rstudiothemes.zip. Unzip and install using the RStudio IDE interface.

Tools > Global Options > Appearance > Add
